mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review SET iuser = #{iuser}, iorder = #{iorder}, iitem = #{iitem}, review_ctnt = #{reviewCtnt}, star_rating = #{starRating}
mapper.select: SELECT A.del_yn FROM `order` A INNER JOIN order_item B ON A.iorder = B.iorder WHERE A.iorder = #{iorder} AND A.iuser = #{iuser} AND B.iitem = #{iitem}
SELECT count(ireview) FROM review WHERE iitem = iitem AND del_yn = 1;

SELECT ireview, `name`, review_ctnt reviewCtnt, A.pic, star_rating starRating, review_like reviewLike FROM review A INNER JOIN `user` B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iitem = #{iitem} AND A.del_yn = 1 LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{row}
